        <value>//gs.info("current.variables.assigned_to:" + current.variables.assigned_to);&#13;
gs.info("current.assigned_to: " + current.assigned_to);&#13;
//gs.info("approval requested from user: " + current.variables.u_requested_for);&#13;
//gs.info("approval requested from user: " + current.variables.approver);&#13;
//gs.info("approval requested from user: " + current.approver);&#13;
&#13;
var snowUser = gs.getUser().getUserByID(current.assigned_to).getFullName();&#13;
var snowEmail = gs.getUser().getUserByID(current.assigned_to).getEmail();&#13;
gs.info(gs.getUser().getUserByID(current.assigned_to).getEmail());&#13;
&#13;
var myName = "juergen";&#13;
var body = {&#13;
	"eventType": "CUSTOM_CONFIGURATION",&#13;
        "attachRules": {&#13;
          "tagRule" : {&#13;
            "meTypes" : ["SERVICE"],&#13;
            "tags" : [ &#13;
              {"context": "ENVIRONMENT", "key": "product", "value": "sockshop"},&#13;
              {"context": "CONTEXTLESS", "key": "service", "value": "carts"},&#13;
              {"context": "CONTEXTLESS", "key": "environment", "value": "juergenupgrade"}&#13;
            ]&#13;
          }&#13;
        },&#13;
        "description" : "Changed Promotion percentage",&#13;
        "configuration":"Promotion Percentage",&#13;
        "changed":'0',&#13;
        "source" : "ServiceNow",&#13;
        "customProperties":{&#13;
          "Approver": snowUser + " [" + snowEmail + "]",&#13;
          "Comment": "Disabled promotion due to failures",&#13;
		  "RemediationProvider": "service-now.com"&#13;
        }&#13;
};    &#13;
&#13;
var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();&#13;
restMessage.setEndpoint("https://tno85405.live.dynatrace.com/api/v1/events?Api-Token=-MEUyeYdTC6HiDcLGKoTS");&#13;
restMessage.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");&#13;
restMessage.setHttpMethod("post");&#13;
restMessage.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));&#13;
var response = restMessage.execute();&#13;
&#13;
gs.info("config event response: " + JSON.stringify(response));</value>

    </sys_variable_value>

        <value>var problem_id = current.correlation_id; //"-5185245356758644387";&#13;
gs.info("current.correlation_id: " + current.correlation_id);&#13;
&#13;
var body = {&#13;
	"comment": "ServiceNow has received the problem notification.",&#13;
	"user": "Remediation Workflow",&#13;
	"context": "ServiceNow"&#13;
};&#13;
&#13;
var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();&#13;
// we are cheating here. using hardcoded values for Api-Token and Dynatrace REST URL&#13;
// they COULD get queried via gliderecords from the configured environments&#13;
restMessage.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "Api-Token I8nOmyUHRPuTbONTYeWVi");&#13;
restMessage.setEndpoint("https://tno85405.live.dynatrace.com/api/v1/problem/details/" + problem_id + "/comments");&#13;
restMessage.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");&#13;
restMessage.setHttpMethod("post");&#13;
restMessage.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));&#13;
var response = restMessage.execute();&#13;
&#13;
gs.info("response: " + response);</value>

        <value>//This script needs to set answer to 'yes' or 'no' to indicate the state of the activity.&#13;
&#13;
//For example,&#13;
&#13;
  answer = isFailureRateProblem();&#13;
&#13;
  function isFailureRateProblem() {&#13;
	  &#13;
    var problem_id = current.correlation_id; //"-5185245356758644387";&#13;
    gs.info("current.correlation_id: " + current.correlation_id);&#13;
    &#13;
    var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();&#13;
    // we are cheating here. using hardcoded values for Api-Token and Dynatrace REST URL&#13;
    // they COULD get queried via gliderecords from the configured environments&#13;
    restMessage.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "Api-Token I8nOmyUHRPuTbONTYeWVi");&#13;
    restMessage.setEndpoint("https://tno85405.live.dynatrace.com/api/v1/problem/details/" + problem_id);&#13;
    restMessage.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");&#13;
    restMessage.setHttpMethod("get");&#13;
    //restMessage.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));&#13;
    var response = restMessage.execute();&#13;
	&#13;
	// parse response&#13;
	var responseBody = JSON.parse( response.getBody() );&#13;
	  &#13;
	  gs.info("responseBody: " + responseBody);&#13;
	  &#13;
	  if (responseBody.result.rankedEvents[0].eventType == "FAILURE_RATE_INCREASED") &#13;
	 {&#13;
	  return 'yes';&#13;
	 }&#13;
	return 'no';&#13;
  }&#13;
</value>

        <value>    var problem_id = current.correlation_id; //"-5185245356758644387";&#13;
    gs.info("current.correlation_id: " + current.correlation_id);&#13;

&#13;
    var body = {&#13;
        "comment": "No auto-remediation action found for this problem.\nAwaiting approval for predefined remediation from user [luke.wilson] in ServiceNow.",&#13;
        "user": "Remediation Workflow",&#13;
        "context": "ServiceNow"&#13;
    };&#13;

        <value>// Set the variable 'answer' to '', 'approved' or 'rejected' to indicate the approval status for this approval.  When called, the following information is available:&#13;
//&#13;
//    counts.total = total number of users that are part of this approval&#13;
//    counts.approved = # of users that approved so far&#13;
//    counts.rejected = # of users that rejected so far&#13;
//    counts.requested = # of users that are pending approval&#13;
//    counts.not_requested = # of users that are not pending approval&#13;
//    counts.not_required = # of users that approval is not required&#13;
//&#13;
</value>

    <sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <document>wf_activity</document>
        <document_key>a0a890af2feba300ad4818acf699b658</document_key>
        <order>2050</order>
        <sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-02-16 17:02:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>20a890af2feba300ad4818acf699b65c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-02-16 17:02:16</sys_updated_on>
        <value>    var problem_id = current.correlation_id; //"-5185245356758644387";&#13;
    gs.info("current.correlation_id: " + current.correlation_id);&#13;
// gs.info("approval requested from user: " + current.variables.u_requested_for);&#13;
// gs.info("approval requested from user: " + current.variables.approver);&#13;
// gs.info("approval requested from user: " + current.approver);&#13;
&#13;
&#13;
    var body = {&#13;
        "comment": "No auto-remediation action found for this problem.\nAwaiting approval for predefined remediation from user [luke.wilson] in ServiceNow.",&#13;
        "user": "Remediation Workflow",&#13;
        "context": "ServiceNow"&#13;
    };&#13;
    &#13;
    var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();&#13;
    // we are cheating here. using hardcoded values for Api-Token and Dynatrace REST URL&#13;
    // they COULD get queried via gliderecords from the configured environments&#13;
    restMessage.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "Api-Token I8nOmyUHRPuTbONTYeWVi");&#13;
    restMessage.setEndpoint("https://tno85405.live.dynatrace.com/api/v1/problem/details/" + problem_id + "/comments");&#13;
    restMessage.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");&#13;
    restMessage.setHttpMethod("post");&#13;
    restMessage.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));&#13;
    var response = restMessage.execute();&#13;
    &#13;
    gs.info("response: " + response);</value>
        <variable display_value="">c35e582f0a0a0ba96248a70985207e63</variable>
    </sys_variable_value>
